title: Promptus - AI Web3 Compute Eco-System
description: Create AI videos, images, audio, 3D, and more. Build secure generative AI workflows and sell your idle GPU compute. Evolve your AI images into AI characters (NFC). Promptus brings creators together to share workflows and create with AI images, art and videos with distributed GPU compute. Craft your own branded AI image generator or microsite in minutes. Customize everything—from style to prompt behavior.
